DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood bone marrow laboratory patient monoclonal gammopathy undetermined significance , multiple myeloma , plasmacytoma may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related disease . It may also help doctor predict patient respond treatment . PURPOSE : This research study look blood bone marrow sample patient monoclonal gammopathy undetermined significance , multiple myeloma , plasmacytoma .
DOC.brief_title: S0120 , Studying Blood Bone Marrow Samples From Patients With Monoclonal Gammopathy Undetermined Significance , Multiple Myeloma , Plasmacytoma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Establish serum , cell , bone marrow tissue bank prospectively collect sample patient monoclonal gammopathy undetermined significance ( MGUS ) , asymptomatic multiple myeloma , solitary plasmacytoma , plasma cell dyscrasia . - Evaluate feasibility accrue patient disease . - Determine whether pattern gene expression cytogenetics exist allow molecular delineation MGUS subtypes . - Characterize cellular humoral immune response know tumor antigens patient . - Cryopreserve serum/T cell future evaluation . - Preliminarily identify biological correlate may relate progression symptomatic disease . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord diagnosis ( monoclonal gammopathy undetermined significance [ MGUS ] plasma cell dyscrasias vs asymptomatic multiple myeloma v solitary plasmacytoma ) . Blood bone marrow sample collect analyzed microarray analysis , cytogenetic analysis , immunobiology study . Unused sample may store future research study . Patients follow periodically 5 year .
